page.title: 18 CHANGES OF LAND USE
page.content:
Kingley Vale has been used in many different ways over the centuries. Today, in 1985, we can still see evidence of past uses:
Stone age implements, skull & jawbone from 5000 years ago. Ancient field systems from about 4000 years ago. Earth banks from about 3000 years ago. Tumuli from about 2500 years ago. Evidence of a Roman Village. Evidence of farming in the Middle Ages. A pond built for a sheep market in 1728. Bullets used for Target Practice during the Boer War. Evidence of rifle fire from the last World War. A variety of{20th century litter.
